name: bmedits2surf
description: Computes a binary map of surface locations where the brainmask.mgz has been edited.

inputs.description: The subject for which the binary map will be computed.
inputs.name: Subject

inputs.description: Output will be on self instead of fsaverage.
inputs.name: Self Output Flag

inputs.description: Do not clean up temporary files.
inputs.name: No Cleanup Flag

inputs.description: Perform operation only on the left hemisphere.
inputs.name: Left Hemisphere Flag

inputs.description: Perform operation only on the right hemisphere.
inputs.name: Right Hemisphere Flag

inputs.description: Do not compute surfaces, only statistics.
inputs.name: No Surfaces Flag

output-files.description: Binary mask of erased surface locations for the left hemisphere in fsaverage space.
output-files.name: Left Hemisphere Erase Mask

output-files.description: Binary mask of erased surface locations for the right hemisphere in fsaverage space.
output-files.name: Right Hemisphere Erase Mask

output-files.description: Binary mask of cloned surface locations for the left hemisphere in fsaverage space.
output-files.name: Left Hemisphere Clone Mask

output-files.description: Binary mask of cloned surface locations for the right hemisphere in fsaverage space.
output-files.name: Right Hemisphere Clone Mask

output-files.description: Statistics about the number of voxels cloned.
output-files.name: Clone Stats File

output-files.description: Statistics about the number of voxels erased.
output-files.name: Erase Stats File

author: FreeSurfer Developers
